com.digi.xbee.api

Class XBee

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.digi.xbee.api.XBee

  • public class XBee
extends Object
    Helper class used to create a serial port connection interface.

    • Constructor Summary

      XBee()

    • Method Detail

      • createConnectiontionInterface

        public static IConnectionInterface createConnectiontionInterface(android.content.Context context,
                                                                 int baudRate)
        Returns an XBee Android connection interface for the given context and baud rate.

        This constructor uses the Android USB host interface API to communicate with the devices.

        Parameters:
        context - The Android application context.
        baudRate - The USB connection baud rate.
        Returns:
        The XBee Android connection interface.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if context == null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if baudRate < 1.
        Since:
        1.2.0
        See Also:
        createConnectiontionInterface(Context, int, AndroidUSBPermissionListener), IConnectionInterface

      • createConnectiontionInterface

        public static IConnectionInterface createConnectiontionInterface(android.content.Context context,
                                                                 int baudRate,
                                                                 AndroidUSBPermissionListener permissionListener)
        Returns an XBee Android connection interface for the given context and baud rate.

        This constructor uses the Android USB host interface API to communicate with the devices.

        Parameters:
        context - The Android context.
        baudRate - The USB connection baud rate.
        permissionListener - The USB permission listener that will be notified when user grants USB permissions.
        Returns:
        The XBee Android connection interface.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if context == null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if baudRate < 1.
        Since:
        1.2.0
        See Also:
        createConnectiontionInterface(Context, int), IConnectionInterface, AndroidUSBPermissionListener

      • createConnectiontionInterface

        public static IConnectionInterface createConnectiontionInterface(android.content.Context context,
                                                                 String port,
                                                                 int baudRate)
        Retrieves an XBee Android connection interface for the given context, port and baud rate.

        This constructor uses the Digi Android Serial Port API based on the RxTx library to communicate with the devices.

        Parameters:
        context - The Android application context.
        port - The Android COM port.
        baudRate - The serial port connection baud rate.
        Returns:
        The XBee Android connection interface.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if context == null or if port == null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if baudRate < 1.
        Since:
        1.2.0
        See Also:
        createConnectiontionInterface(Context, String, SerialPortParameters), IConnectionInterface

      • createConnectiontionInterface

        public static IConnectionInterface createConnectiontionInterface(android.content.Context context,
                                                                 String port,
                                                                 SerialPortParameters serialPortParameters)
        Retrieves an XBee Android connection interface for the given context, port and parameters.

        This constructor uses the Digi Android Serial Port API based on the RxTx library to communicate with the devices.

        Parameters:
        context - The Android application context.
        port - The Android COM port.
        serialPortParameters - The serial port parameters.
        Returns:
        The XBee Android connection interface.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if context == null or if port == null or if serialPortParameters == null.
        Since:
        1.2.0
        See Also:
        createConnectiontionInterface(Context, String, int), IConnectionInterface, SerialPortParameters

      • createConnectiontionInterface

        public static IConnectionInterface createConnectiontionInterface(String port,
                                                                 int baudRate)
        Returns a serial port connection interface for the provided port with the given baud rate.
        Parameters:
        port - Serial port name.
        baudRate - Serial port baud rate.
        Returns:
        The serial port connection interface.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if baudRate < 1.
        NullPointerException - if port == null.
        See Also:
        createConnectiontionInterface(String, SerialPortParameters), IConnectionInterface

      • createConnectiontionInterface

        public static IConnectionInterface createConnectiontionInterface(String port,
                                                                 SerialPortParameters serialPortParameters)
        Returns a serial port connection interface for the provided port with the given serial port parameters.
        Parameters:
        port - Serial port name.
        serialPortParameters - Serial port parameters.
        Returns:
        The serial port connection interface.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if port == null or if serialPortParameters == null.
        See Also:
        createConnectiontionInterface(String, int), IConnectionInterface, SerialPortParameters
